idea-plugin.name: ${plugin.name}
idea-plugin.description:
Integrates with Simple Build Tool (SBT) to enable building Scala projects easily and quickly.
    Quick Start
  1. Check that "Settings / SBT" has the right "sbt-launch.jar" file configured
  2. Go to the "Before launch" options of a Run Configuration, uncheck "Make" and choose "Run SBT Action / test-compile"
  3. Now when you run it, the project will be compiled using SBT
